mapper.select: SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(B.MC_J) NAME, nvl(sum(A.YBLSL + A.DQDDRS), 0) VALUE FROM T_DT_DTQHTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.DT_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM GROUP BY B.SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(B.MC_J) NAME, nvl(sum(A.DQDDRS), 0) VALUE FROM T_DT_DTQHTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.DT_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM GROUP BY B.SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(B.MC_J) NAME, nvl(sum(A.YBLSL), 0) VALUE FROM T_DT_DTQHTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.DT_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM GROUP BY B.SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(MC_J) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM union all SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'))
WHERE SWJG_DM IN ('13101010000', '13101040000', '13101050000', '13101060000', '13101070000', '13101090000', '13101100000', '13101150000', '13101410000', '13100430000')
WHERE SWJG_DM IN ('13101120000', '13101130000', '13101140000', '13102300000', '13102280000', '13102270000', '13102290000', '13102260000')
GROUP BY SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(MC_J) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) ||'0000' = B.SWJG_DM union all SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'yyyy'))
WHERE SWJG_DM IN ('13101010000', '13101040000', '13101050000', '13101060000', '13101070000', '13101090000', '13101100000', '13101150000', '13101410000', '13100430000')
WHERE SWJG_DM IN ('13101120000', '13101130000', '13101140000', '13102300000', '13102280000', '13102270000', '13102290000', '13102260000')
GROUP BY SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT DTYWXL_DM, NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT B.DTYWXL_DM, MIN(B.MC) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_DTYWXL B WHERE A.DT_DM = B.DT_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = B.DTYWXL_DM GROUP BY B.DTYWXL_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT DTYWXL_DM,NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT DTYWXL_DM,MIN(MC) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.DTYWXL_DM, B.MC FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_DTYWXL B WHERE A.DT_DM = B.DT_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = B.DTYWXL_DM UNION ALL SELECT A.DTYWXL_DM, B.MC FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_DTYWXL B WHERE A.DT_DM = B.DT_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = B.DTYWXL_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')) GROUP BY DTYWXL_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT DTYWXL_DM,NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT DTYWXL_DM,MIN(MC) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.DTYWXL_DM, B.MC FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_DTYWXL B WHERE A.DT_DM = B.DT_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = B.DTYWXL_DM UNION ALL SELECT A.DTYWXL_DM, B.MC FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_DTYWXL B WHERE A.DT_DM = B.DT_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = B.DTYWXL_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'yyyy')) GROUP BY DTYWXL_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(B.MC_J) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM AND A.DTYWXL_DM = #{ywlxDm} GROUP BY B.SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(MC_J) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM union all SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')) WHERE DTYWXL_DM = #{ywlxDm} GROUP BY SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT NAME, VALUE FROM (SELECT MIN(MC_J) NAME, COUNT(1) VALUE FROM (SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_DTBLQK A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM union all SELECT A.LSH, A.DTYWXL_DM, B.SWJG_DM, B.MC_J FROM T_DT_BLQKTJ A, T_DM_GY_SWJG B WHERE SUBSTR(A.SWFJ_DM, 1, 7) || '0000' = B.SWJG_DM AND A.TJRQ >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'yyyy')) WHERE DTYWXL_DM = #{ywlxDm} GROUP BY SWJG_DM ORDER BY VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT NVL(SUM(QHSL), 0) QHSL, NVL(SUM(YBLSL), 0) YBLSL, NVL(SUM(DQDDRS), 0) DQDDRS FROM T_DT_DTQHTJ
select 3412 as OPEN,4432 as PAUSE, 789 as CLOSE from dual
select 3412 as LOCAL,4432 as NONLOCAL from dual
SELECT NVL(SUM(T.YBLSL+T.DQDDRS),0) as count FROM T_DT_DTQHTJ T
